Rentals

We are slowly expanding our rental offers to provide new bikes and bike related equipment at student prices.
We would love to see their pictures on Social Media (#veloplus, #velovezh). Otherwise you can send them to us via email so that more people get to find out about them.
For any questions just send an email to rent@velovezh.ch

Panniers

You can rent panniers (Ortlieb Backroller Classic) by filling out this form.
Saddlebags always come in pairs.



Depot: 50 CHF
One day5 CHF
One week20 CHF

Tandem

If you want to rent VELOVE's Cannondale Tandem you need to fill out this form.



Depot: 100 CHF
Tuesday to Thursday30 CHF
Thursday to Tuesday60 CHF
One Week80 CHF

A special thanks to our sponsors who are essential to the growth of Velove
